text: Jo koi Allah ki raah mein watan ko choray ga woh zamin mein boht si qayam ki jagahen bhi paye ga aur kushaadgi bhi aur jo koi apney ghar say Allah Taalaa aur uss kay rasool (PBUH) ki taraf nikal khara hua phir ussay maut ney aa pakra to bhi yaqeenan uss ka ajar Allah Taalaa kay zimmay sabit hogaya aur Allah Taalaa bara bakshney wala meharban hai
